title: How seriously Indian states are funding artificial intelligence ambitions
description: A review of FY26 state Budget speeches shows wide variation in how Indian states plan to adopt AI and how little most are willing to spend on it

title: Alphabet Reaches US$4 Trillion Valuation Powered by AI Strategy
description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, News Ghana, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/alphabet-reaches-us4-trillion-valuation-powered-by-ai-strategy/Google’s parent company, Alphabet, has hit a US$4 trillion market valuation on Monday, January 12, 2026, as its sharpened AI focus allayed doubts about its strategy and thrust it back to the forefront of the high stakes race. title: 18-Year-Old Piper Rockelle Asks Grok AI to Undress Her
description: Piper Rockelle, who joined OnlyFans earlier this year, is one of the most viral internet celebrities across the world. She has faced her share of controversies since joining OnlyFans, but remains very active on social media platforms. title: Warhammer maker reports record sales and shuns AI in favour of ‘human creators’
description: Games Workshop has said it made record high half-year sales as the maker of Warhammer figurines shunned the use of artificial intelligence (AI)-generated content and stood by its “human creators”.
